newsitem.title: SPAIN: Results of Endesa bids for Sevillana, Fecsa.
newsitem.headline: Results of Endesa bids for Sevillana, Fecsa.

text.p: The bid by Spain's Endesa for 75 percent of regional electricity firm Sevillana was oversubscribed, the stock market commission CMNV said on Friday.
Endesa's bid for Sevillana was for a maximum of 106,085,007 shares, while shareholders tendered a total of 151,417,489. The total accepted was 106,084,974.
Endesa's offer for Fecsa attracted a similar response, with 92,145,401 shares tendered by shareholders and 54,275,175 taken up by Endesa.
The CNMV added that the figures do not represent the final result of the offer, which will be released today.
